trs: In this school they punish the students.’}

trs: One is never satisfied.’}

trs: One is frequently betrayed by false friends.’}

trs: One does not come to work dressed like that.

src: În ultima     vreme te           examinezi  prea des     la şcoală.

src: La noi întotdeauna se întâmpină  \{musafirii / *Ion /*el\} la gară

src: Am     întâmpinat musafirii / *Ion / *el

src: S-a     adus      mama         lui
trs: His mother was brought.’}
